body_html: at each timestep of the backprop of the RNN chain, does it create a new dE/dW and then the optimizer does a reduction? or does the network write to the exact same dE/dW and no reduction is needed? i think this is part of the slowdown.
body_text: at each timestep of the backprop of the RNN chain, does it create a new dE/dW and then the optimizer does a reduction? or does the network write to the exact same dE/dW and no reduction is needed? i think this is part of the slowdown.
body: at each timestep of the backprop of the RNN chain, does it create a new dE/dW and then the optimizer does a reduction? or does the network write to the exact same dE/dW and no reduction is needed? i think this is part of the slowdown.
